issue.title: [Python] Run S3 tests in the nightly dask integration build
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16458](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16458). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As a follow-up on https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13033 (ARROW-16413), we should update the `integration_dask.sh` script to also run the S3 tests from the dask test suite. 

See https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13033/commits/1bca56e932434d6b0dc947dd51915d83f9dd3a43 (in that commit I removed that again, because it was still failing due to some moto timeout)

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16458?focusedCommentId=17532225) by Joris Van den Bossche (jorisvandenbossche):*
Issue resolved by pull request 13071
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13071>
